page.title: 02TRADE.Shopping Survey.
page.content: Forty people took part in the shopping survey.More than three quarters of the people asked were old aged pensioners.Five eights of the survey asked shopped in Wrotham either daily or weekly.The rest said they hardly ever shopped in Wrotham. Although local people use the shops frequently 25% do there main shopping at Borough Green.Most of these said that a bus ride to Gravesend would be too costly.Most of the locals walk to the shops themselves they include a butchers,a post office, a grocery shop, a hair and beauty shop, a bank and a newsagents.Many local people said they would like to see a chemist shop open in the village.
